original_title: Spanish Fly: A Tribute to Jose Wejebe
overview: This special film is a living tribute to Fishing Legend, Jose Wejebe onboard his beloved Spanish Fly in Northern Baja, Mexico. At just 54, the charismatic, award-winning ESPN TV series host tragically passed in a plane crash in 2012. We join Julio Mesa of FishCo and the former governor to honor his memory in an epic tour of some of Bajaâ€™s hotspots to fish Grouper, Calicos, Yellowtail and Dorado.
title: Spanish Fly: A Tribute to Jose Wejebe
